title: Drawing, "Temple of Neptune, Paestum, Italy", April 1869
medium: Graphite on light gray wove paper
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center right:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top center:  sea / green / brown; again, at center left:  olive / sea / sea / green / flowers; again at center:  green sea; again, at center right: green / brown / pale green; again, at lower left:  stones / green / yellow / and ochrous; again, at bottom left:  old wall / rich grey / with some orange / tinted stones / water; and at bottom right:  Paestum April /69
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view showing at top the southwest corner of the Basilica and the sea, and a distant view of the Temple of Neptune and the Basilica seen from the East with a tree in the right foreground and an olive tree, a house, and the old wall in the left foreground.

Verso:  Horizontal view with the Temple of Neptune visible at the right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Temple of Neptune, Paestum, Italy", April 1869.
April 1869. Graphite on light gray wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-494.
